dimensions:
29 x 57 cm (11 7/16 x 22 7/16 in.)
a) to g) Height: 30.0 cm x Width: 57.2 cm
j) Height: 62.5 cm x width: 57.2 cm
title: Bruges
description:
Large-scale design, of straight repeat. Diagonally-set serpentine banderoles intertwined with foliate and floral forms. 
Seven color combinations: 
a) greens on lighter green ground; b) white on pale pink satin-finish ground; c) light blue-green on mica-covered blue-green; d) dark green on lighter green of mottled surface; e) green and blue on white; f) brown on coral; g/j) light and darker brown on white.
name: Sidewall
